languages.english-overview:
SuperCali is an event calendar script that supports nested categories of events and multiple moderators, making it a good choice for organizations managing a large number of activities. SuperCali is designed to make data entry as easy and error-free as possible as well as provide a flexible, modular framework for displaying event information.
SuperCali is released under the GNU General Public License.

ul.li: XHTML/CSS output makes it easy for Web designers to customize
Can be configured for different languages

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_email: Please provide the email to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_email: The Admin email is incorrect and does not exist!
